top_strengths: All 6 agents achieved STRONG_PASS for the first time in project history, with composites ranging from 86.05 (thariq) to 93.7 (jason) (boris, cat, thariq, lydia, ado, jason)

Multiple chronic items (3-4+ iterations) resolved this cycle: parseToRecord helper, builder type assertions, try-storage tests, dynamic score_history, demo-repo, adaptive budgets, BYOK 1.2M, axe-core CI (boris, cat, thariq, ado, jason)
Zero any types with strict TypeScript (noUncheckedIndexedAccess + noImplicitReturns), 269 tests passing, 8 runtime validators -- code quality infrastructure is best-in-class (boris, lydia)
Comprehensive accessibility: skip-to-content, useReducedMotion in 7 components, 59 ARIA attributes, axe-core in CI, 7 locales with RTL Arabic (lydia, ado, jason)
top_weaknesses: CHRONIC (4+ iterations): toLocaleString('en-US') in StreamingAgentCard.tsx:254 remains hardcoded -- flagged by boris, lydia, and jason
text-gray-400 on bg-gray-800 surfaces fail WCAG AA contrast ratio -- 18 instances remain, flagged by lydia and ado
Skip-to-content text hardcoded in English despite 7-locale i18n support -- flagged by ado and jason
CHRONIC (4+ iterations): No score progression screenshot/GIF in README -- flagged by ado

agent_a.position: Compound learning score rose to 92 -- all 3 chronic items resolved proves the feedback loop is working effectively

agent_b.position: Emergent behavior at 80 -- adaptive budgets are size-based only, cross-iteration context limited to 1 prior review

divergent_opinions.analysis: Both agents are correct within their domains. Boris evaluates process learning (strong -- all chronic items resolved). Thariq evaluates AI system learning (developing -- lacks complexity-awareness and multi-iteration memory). The gap reflects process learning vs AI system learning.

action_items.action: Replace toLocaleString('en-US') in StreamingAgentCard.tsx:254 with Intl.DateTimeFormat(undefined, ...) or next-intl useFormatter
action_items.impact: Closes chronic 4+ iteration i18n gap flagged by 3 agents

action_items.impact: Closes persistent contrast accessibility gap

action_items.action: Internationalize skip-to-content text by replacing hardcoded English with i18n message key from next-intl
action_items.impact: Ensures a11y landmark is localized for all 7 supported locales

action_items.action: Add score progression screenshot or GIF to README showing dashboard improvement visualization
action_items.impact: Visual proof of improvement loop in first README scroll; closes chronic 4+ iteration gap

action_items.impact: Removes 2 remaining UI-layer type assertions

action_items.impact: Improves power-user discoverability; closes chronic 3+ iteration gap

strengths: All 3 chronic items resolved: parseToRecord in type-guards.ts, BuilderAgent/BuilderCriterion casts eliminated, try-storage.test.ts added with 13 tests
Pipeline architecture well-decomposed: try-invoke -> try-debate -> try-revisions -> try-synthesize, each with single responsibility
269 tests, 0 any types, 0 TS errors, strict mode with noUncheckedIndexedAccess, 8 runtime validators
weaknesses: One `as Record<string, unknown>` at try-invoke.ts:215 (SDK type boundary)
try-storage.test.ts only covers filesystem path, not Redis/Upstash path
